flawed_nl_solution:
Daria wants to buy tickets for four persons, so the cost will be 4 tickets * $90/ticket = $<<4*90=360>>360.
Daria currently has $189, so she needs $360 - $189 = $<<360-189=711>>711 more.
#### 711

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 171, not 711. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
